item.title: SQLite: Past, Present, and Future
item.description: Table of Contents 1 INTRODUCTION 2 ARCHITECTURE 2.1 Modules 1 INTRODUCTION SQLite is embedded in the process of the host application Instead of communicating with a database server across process boundaries, applications manage a SQLite database by calling SQLite library functions several characteristics combine to make SQLite useful in a broad range of scenario: Cross-platform 数据库保存在单一文件中，文件可
